techmeme.title: A profile of Yang Zhilin, the founder and CEO of China's highest-valued AI unicorn Moonshot, who studied at Carnegie Mellon University and worked at Huawei (Ben Jiang/South China Morning Post)
Sony reports Q1 revenue up 2% YoY to ~$20.5B, vs. ~$19.31B est., operating profit up 10% YoY to ~$1.92B, vs. $1.89B est., and 2.4M PS5 sales, down from 3.3M YoY (CNBC)
Global crypto hubs like Hong Kong and Dubai face a challenging outlook, as the brightening US political backdrop for crypto attracts companies and investors (Bloomberg)
A profile of Kakao founder Kim Beom-su, who was arrested in July on stock manipulation charges relating to Kakao's takeover of K-pop agency SM Entertainment (Financial Times)
Division in Hollywood's approach to AI is growing, as some studios want to use AI tools more often in production, while unions aim to establish guardrails (Winston Cho/The Hollywood Reporter)
